</div>

<div class="mw-content-ltr mw-parser-output" dir="ltr" lang="en"><p><b>Slingshot</b> is an esolang created by <a href="/wiki/User:ChuckEsoteric08" title="User:ChuckEsoteric08">User:ChuckEsoteric08</a> in 2025 based on <a href="/wiki/Incrementing_machine" title="Incrementing machine">Incrementing machine</a> and <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ZISC" title="ZISC">ZISC</a>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Description">Description</span></h2>
<p>Program is a list of nonnegative integers seperated by spaces which represent initial memory tape with indexes starting at 0. After it is initialised execution starts
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Execution">Execution</span></h3>
<p>Increment cell <code>x</code> (where <code>x</code> is the value of current cell), move pointer right and if the resulting value is equal to the cell <code>y</code> (where <code>y</code> is the value of current cell after the pointer is moved) pointer is moved <code>z</code> cells to the right (where <code>z</code> is the value of cell right after the current cell), else it would move pointer 2 times forward. If pointer moves out of bounds it warps around to the start of the tape.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Computational_class">Computational class</span></h2>
<p>It is trivial to translate Incrementing machine into Slingshot, proving that it is <a href="/wiki/Turing-complete" title="Turing-complete">Turing-complete</a>. It uses special version of Incrementing machine (IM) with line numbers:
</p>
<pre>a b c
</pre>
<p>Increment register <code>a</code> and if it is equal to register <code>b</code> jump to command <code>c</code>, else execute the next command. Indexes of both registers and line numbers start at 0. Translation uses this definitions:
</p>
<ul><li><code>m</code> refers to the number of IM commands multiplied by 3</li>
<li><code>n</code> refers to number of counters</li>
<li><code>p</code> refers to the number of commands executed, excluding the current one, multipled by 3</li>
<li><code>q</code> refers to number of commands after the current one multiplied by 3</li></ul>
<p>If line <code>c</code> is after the current command:
</p>
<pre>m+a m+b c*3-p-1 
</pre>
<p>If line <code>c</code> is before the current command or it jumps to itself:
</p>
<pre>m+a m+b c*3+q+n-1 
</pre>
<p>As an example there is this 4-register IM program which simulates 2-register Minsky Machine calculating 3+2 and storing the result in the first register, and then incrementing second register infinitly:
</p>
<pre>0 0 1
0 0 2
0 0 3
2 2 4
2 2 5
2 2 6
3 2 8
0 0 6
2 2 8 
</pre>
<p>Which results in:
</p>
<pre>27 27 2 27 27 2 27 27 2 29 29 2 29 29 2 29 29 2 30 29 5 27 27 22 29 29 27 0 0 0 0    
</pre>
<!-- 
NewPP limit report
Cached time: 20250919235952
Cache expiry: 86400
Reduced expiry: false
Complications: []
CPU time usage: 0.005 seconds
Real time usage: 0.006 seconds
Preprocessor visited node count: 12/1000000
Post‐expand include size: 0/2097152 bytes
Template argument size: 0/2097152 bytes
Highest expansion depth: 2/100
Expensive parser function count: 0/100
Unstrip recursion depth: 0/20
Unstrip post‐expand size: 0/5000000 bytes
-->
<!--
Transclusion expansion time report (%,ms,calls,template)
100.00%    0.000      1 -total
-->
<!-- Saved in parser cache with key esolang_wiki:pcache:idhash:23551-0!canonical and timestamp 20250919235952 and revision id 164841. Rendering was triggered because: page-view
 -->
</div>

<div class="mw-content-ltr mw-parser-output" dir="ltr" lang="en"><p><b>SMETANA To Infinity!</b> is an esoteric programming language inspired by <a href="/wiki/SMETANA" title="SMETANA">SMETANA</a>. It was created by Tanner Swett in 2016.
</p>
<div aria-labelledby="mw-toc-heading" class="toc" id="toc" role="navigation"><input class="toctogglecheckbox" id="toctogglecheckbox" role="button" style="display:none" type="checkbox"/><div class="toctitle" dir="ltr" lang="en"><h2 id="mw-toc-heading">Contents</h2><span class="toctogglespan"><label class="toctogglelabel" for="toctogglecheckbox"></label></span></div>
<ul>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-1"><a href="#Syntax"><span class="tocnumber">1</span> <span class="toctext">Syntax</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-2"><a href="#Execution"><span class="tocnumber">2</span> <span class="toctext">Execution</span></a>
<ul>
<li class="toclevel-2 tocsection-3"><a href="#Example_of_memory_initialization"><span class="tocnumber">2.1</span> <span class="toctext">Example of memory initialization</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-2 tocsection-4"><a href="#Main_execution"><span class="tocnumber">2.2</span> <span class="toctext">Main execution</span></a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-5"><a href="#Computational_class"><span class="tocnumber">3</span> <span class="toctext">Computational class</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-6"><a href="#External_resources"><span class="tocnumber">4</span> <span class="toctext">External resources</span></a></li>
</ul>
</div>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Syntax">Syntax</span></h2>
<pre>Program    ::= {Step "."}
Step       ::= "Step" Expression "." (GoTo | Swap | Output | "Stop")
GoTo       ::= "Go" "to" "step" Expression
Swap       ::= "Swap" "step" Expression "with" "step" Expression
Output     ::= "Output" "character" Expression
Expression ::= Number | [Number] "n" ["+" Number]
</pre>
<p>"Number" means a token consisting of one or more decimal digits, interpreted as a decimal number. It is illegal to use a number token whose value is 0, except in an "output" statement. Letters within tokens can have any capitalization. Whitespace is allowed before and after tokens, but not within tokens. If the first non-whitespace character on a line is "#", that line is ignored.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Execution">Execution</span></h2>
<p>The memory of a program consists of an infinite array of memory cells ("steps"), indexed by the positive integers, each one containing one instruction. Initially, every memory cell contains the instruction "Stop".
</p><p>Execution consists of two phases: memory initialization and main execution. Conceptually, memory initialization may involve modifying infinitely many memory cells. An implementation of SMETANA To Infinity! must somehow simulate this process using a finite amount of time.
</p><p>To perform memory initialization, repeat the following process for each statement in the program, in order:
</p>
<ul><li>Check whether the step number of the statement is an integer or an "n" expression.</li>
<li>If the step number is an integer:
<ul><li>Every expression in the statement must be an integer. If one of the statements is an "n" expression, then the program is illegal.</li>
<li>Load the body of the statement into memory at the index specified by the step number.</li></ul></li>
<li>If the step number is an "n" expression:
<ul><li>For each positive integer "n":
<ul><li>Consider the statement formed by replacing each "n" expression with its value.</li>
<li>Load the body of this new statement into memory at the index specified by its step number.</li></ul></li></ul></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Example_of_memory_initialization">Example of memory initialization</span></h3>
<p>Consider this program:
</p>
<pre>Step n. Go to step 3n + 1.
Step 2n. Go to step n.
Step 1. Go to step 7.
Step 4. Stop.
</pre>
<p>After memory initialization, the memory will contain:
</p>
<pre> 1: Go to step 7.
 2: Go to step 1.
 3: Go to step 10.
 4: Stop.
 5: Go to step 16.
 6: Go to step 3.
 7: Go to step 22.
 8: Go to step 4.
 9: Go to step 28.
10: Go to step 5.
11: Go to step 34.
12: Go to step 6.
(...)
</pre>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Main_execution">Main execution</span></h3>
<p>To perform main execution, execute the instructions in memory in sequence, starting with step 1. After a "go to" instruction is executed, continue executing at the specified location, instead of at the location following the "go to" instruction. After a "stop" instruction is executed, stop executing instructions.
</p><p>The interpretation of the numbers which are output is unspecified. They could be interpreted as bytes, as Unicode scalar values, or just as numbers.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Computational_class">Computational class</span></h2>
<p>SMETANA To Infinity! seems to be <a href="/wiki/Turing-complete" title="Turing-complete">Turing-complete</a>. A Turing machine (with tape infinite in only one direction) could be implemented by representing each space on the tape as a sequence of contiguous memory cells. The state of a cell could be represented by swapping around some of the instructions in the cell. Motion of the head could be implemented by jumping between regions of memory, and the state of the head could be represented by jumping to a specific location within each region.
</p><p>An alternative proof of Turing-completeness is to note that you can pretty much directly write the <a href="/wiki/Collatz_function" title="Collatz function">Collatz function</a> encoding of a <a href="/wiki/Fractran" title="Fractran">Fractran</a> program, using only the `Go to` and `Stop` commands. The Collatz function rule
</p>
<pre><i>f</i>(<i>mx</i>+<i>i</i>) = <i>a<sub>i</sub>x</i> + <i>b<sub>i</sub></i>
</pre>
<p>becomes
</p>
<pre>Step <i>m</i> n + <i>i</i>. Go to step <i>a<sub>i</sub></i> n + <i>b<sub>i</sub></i>.
</pre>
<p>Yet another way to note Turing-completeness is that <a href="/wiki/Tip" title="Tip">Tip</a> compiles almost directly into SMETANA To Infinity.
</p><p>Also, see <a href="/wiki/SMETANA_To_Infinity!/brainfuck" title="SMETANA To Infinity!/brainfuck">SMETANA To Infinity!/brainfuck</a> for methods of translating from (1-bit) brainfuck.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="External_resources">External resources</span></h2>
<ul><li><a class="external text" href="https://github.com/anthonykozar/Smetana2Infinity" rel="nofollow">Smetana2Infinity.py, an interpreter in Python 2</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="https://gist.github.com/int-e/57eefc6cce29ed47ddaaca13a0774533" rel="nofollow">Quine and corresponding generator, a bit too large for the wiki</a> (<a class="external text" href="https://gist.github.com/int-e/57eefc6cce29ed47ddaaca13a0774533/raw/24c3bb16111914313a3ddeeb7c4e60543f302413/quine.s2i" rel="nofollow">raw file</a>)</li></ul>

</div>

<div class="mw-content-ltr mw-parser-output" dir="ltr" lang="en"><p><b>Smurf</b> is an <a href="/wiki/Esoteric_programming_language" title="Esoteric programming language">esoteric programming language</a> designed by <a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Matthew_Westcott&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Matthew Westcott (page does not exist)">Matthew Westcott</a> in an attempt to cut down <a href="/wiki/Muriel" title="Muriel">Muriel</a> to the bare minimum, retaining that language's self-propagation paradigm. The only native data type is the string.
</p><p>The runtime environment consists of a program (a series of characters), a stack of strings, and a variable store that behaves like an imperative language.
</p>
<div aria-labelledby="mw-toc-heading" class="toc" id="toc" role="navigation"><input class="toctogglecheckbox" id="toctogglecheckbox" role="button" style="display:none" type="checkbox"/><div class="toctitle" dir="ltr" lang="en"><h2 id="mw-toc-heading">Contents</h2><span class="toctogglespan"><label class="toctogglelabel" for="toctogglecheckbox"></label></span></div>
<ul>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-1"><a href="#Memory"><span class="tocnumber">1</span> <span class="toctext">Memory</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-2"><a href="#Commands"><span class="tocnumber">2</span> <span class="toctext">Commands</span></a>
<ul>
<li class="toclevel-2 tocsection-3"><a href="#The_string_command"><span class="tocnumber">2.1</span> <span class="toctext">The string command</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-2 tocsection-4"><a href="#Stack_commands"><span class="tocnumber">2.2</span> <span class="toctext">Stack commands</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-2 tocsection-5"><a href="#Variable_commands"><span class="tocnumber">2.3</span> <span class="toctext">Variable commands</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-2 tocsection-6"><a href="#The_execute_command"><span class="tocnumber">2.4</span> <span class="toctext">The execute command</span></a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-7"><a href="#Example_code"><span class="tocnumber">3</span> <span class="toctext">Example code</span></a>
<ul>
<li class="toclevel-2 tocsection-8"><a href="#Reversing_input"><span class="tocnumber">3.1</span> <span class="toctext">Reversing input</span></a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-9"><a href="#See_also"><span class="tocnumber">4</span> <span class="toctext">See also</span></a></li>
<li class="toclevel-1 tocsection-10"><a href="#External_resources"><span class="tocnumber">5</span> <span class="toctext">External resources</span></a></li>
</ul>
</div>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Memory">Memory</span></h2>
<p>Smurf programs can access a stack of strings and a <i>variable store</i>, which maps variable names (which can be any string, including the empty string) on to values, which are also strings. An uninitialised variable will map on to the empty string.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Commands">Commands</span></h2>
<p>Smurf programs consist of commands which may be separated by whitespace.
</p><p>The <a class="external text" href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/graue/esofiles/master/smurf/doc/smurf.txt" rel="nofollow">Smurf specification</a> contains several ambiguities. The description below takes into account the behaviour of the Perl interpreter written by the language's creator, which can be regarded as a reference interpreter for the language.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="The_string_command">The string command</span></h3>
<p>The string command, represented by a quotation mark, pushes the string that follows it onto the stack. A string is delimited by quote marks and may contain newlines, quotation marks and backslashes, so long as these are escaped by backslashes. Any invalid escape sequence is treated as a backslash followed by the escaped character (for example, "\x" is treated as if it were "\\x"). Examples of usage:
</p>
<pre>"example"
"\"\n\\"
"\"\"""\"\""
</pre>
<p>The first example pushes the string 'example' onto the stack. The second example pushes onto the stack a string consisting of a quotation mark, a newline and a backslash. The final example pushes two strings onto the stack, each consisting of two quotation marks.
</p><p>The specification does not specify the effect of a newline occuring inside a string in a program. To ensure compatibility, programmers should instead use the escape sequence to encode newlines.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Stack_commands">Stack commands</span></h3>
<p>The command represented by a plus sign concatenates the two strings at the top of the stack, with the string pushed first appearing first in the resultant string.
</p><p>The command represented by a lowercase 'i' inputs a string from the user and pushes it onto the stack. The specification does not define the behaviour of this command in non-interactive programs, so interpreters may read the input one line at a time, or alternatively use the whole input the first time the 'i' command is executed.  The specification does not define the behaviour of this command when no input is present, so interpreters may push the empty string onto the stack, or alternatively not push a value onto the stack at all, although the former behaviour makes programming easier.
</p><p>The command represented by a lowercase 'o' outputs the string at the top of the stack.
</p><p>The command represented by a lowercase 'h' replaces the string at the top of the stack with its head (that is, the first character).
</p><p>The command represented by a lowercase 't' replaces the string at the top of the stack with its tail (that is, all except the first character).
</p><p>The command represented by a lowercase 'q' 'quotifies' the string at the top of stack - it escapes all newline, quotation marks and backslashes, and places quotation marks at the start and end.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Variable_commands">Variable commands</span></h3>
<p>The command represented by a lowercase 'p' pops two strings from the stack, and sets the variable with the name specified by the first string popped to the value specified by the second string popped.
</p><p>The command represented by a lowercase 'g' pops a variable name from the stack, and then pushes the variable's value onto the stack.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="The_execute_command">The execute command</span></h3>
<p>The execute command, represented by a lowercase 'x', executes the string at the top of the stack as a Smurf program. The stack and variable store are erased before the string is executed - in other words, the string replaces the currently running program, and there is no way to return to the program.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Example_code">Example code</span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Reversing_input">Reversing input</span></h3>
<p>The following program by <a href="/wiki/Safalra" title="Safalra">Safalra</a> reverses its input, and demonstrates the simulation of conditionals and loops in Smurf. Newlines have been inserted every 80 characters for greater readability.
</p>
<pre>"+"i+""p""gtg""gt"i"p"\"\"p\"i\"gh\"o\"g+\"o\"p\"i\"gt\"i\"p\"\\\"+\\\"\\\"\\\"p
\"\"i\"gq+\"tg\"+\"i\"gq+\"\\\"i\\\"p\"+\"o\"gq+\"\\\"o\\\"p\"+\"\"gq+\"\"g+\"\"
p\"o\"gq\"o\"+\"+\"pgx"""p"\"+\"\"\"p""i"gq+"tg"+"i"gq+"\"i\"p\"\""+""gq+""g+""p
"""+""i"g+pgx
</pre>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also">See also</span></h2>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Muriel" title="Muriel">Muriel</a></li></ul>

<div class="mw-content-ltr mw-parser-output" dir="ltr" lang="en"><p>Smolder is a cellular automaton invented by <a href="/wiki/User:Aadenboy" title="User:Aadenboy">User:Aadenboy</a> created from a failed attempt at recreating <a href="/wiki/Burn" title="Burn">Burn</a>.
</p>
<div aria-labelledby="mw-toc-heading" class="toc" id="toc" role="navigation"><input class="toctogglecheckbox" id="toctogglecheckbox" role="button" style="display:none" type="checkbox"/><div class="toctitle" dir="ltr" lang="en"><h2 id="mw-toc-heading">Contents</h2><span class="toctogglespan"><label class="toctogglelabel" for="toctogglecheckbox"></label></span></div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Structure">Structure</span></h2>
<p>Smolder's state space consists of a square tiling of cells, each with a green, blue, and optionally a red channel, with each channel being in the range of <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle [0,3]}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<mo stretchy="false">[</mo>
<mn>0</mn>
<mo>,</mo>
<mn>3</mn>
<mo stretchy="false">]</mo>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle [0,3]}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle [0,3]}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d5c9e70f7d437509d4ebedb0eaf7ada946e91a79" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:4.653ex; height:2.843ex;"/></span>. If a cell's blue and green channels are both zero, or it has a red channel, it will not tick.
</p><p>Every tick, all cells which do not have a red channel and are orthogonally adjacent to one or more cells with a red channel greater than zero follow this procedure:
</p>
<ul><li>Define the cell's blue, green, and red channels as <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle c_{b}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<msub>
<mi>c</mi>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi>b</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle c_{b}}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle c_{b}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/9915e0b042594b3e0730c344584433cf2a41e06c" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.944ex; height:2.009ex;"/></span>, <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle c_{g}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<msub>
<mi>c</mi>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi>g</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle c_{g}}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle c_{g}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0f66b66841d4193e6ef61fe348c322d7616acc32" style="vertical-align: -1.005ex; width:2.028ex; height:2.343ex;"/></span>, and <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle c_{r}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<msub>
<mi>c</mi>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi>r</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle c_{r}}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle c_{r}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/70f0d4b75418b6deb56b7a9d66396b3f610e9007" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.981ex; height:2.009ex;"/></span>, where <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle c}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<mi>c</mi>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle c}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle c}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/86a67b81c2de995bd608d5b2df50cd8cd7d92455" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.007ex; height:1.676ex;"/></span> refers to the cell.</li>
<li>Add up the channels for all of the orthogonally adjacent cells which have a red channel greater than zero, and define them as <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle t_{b}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<msub>
<mi>t</mi>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi>b</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle t_{b}}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle t_{b}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/1ca101f3ac73e0d38184d4aec1bdbb5dcad7cbb8" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.777ex; height:2.343ex;"/></span>, <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle t_{g}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<msub>
<mi>t</mi>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi>g</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle t_{g}}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle t_{g}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/fb06b4e7f223c17fb775d9458e2d34957b062351" style="vertical-align: -1.005ex; width:1.861ex; height:2.676ex;"/></span>, and <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle t_{r}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<msub>
<mi>t</mi>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi>r</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle t_{r}}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle t_{r}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/a50aad1c6e0103f6f74a56aff0561f45714161a9" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.813ex; height:2.343ex;"/></span>, each <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle \mathrm {mod} \ 4}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
<mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
<mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
</mrow>
<mtext> </mtext>
<mn>4</mn>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle \mathrm {mod} \ 4}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle \mathrm {mod} \ 4}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/5a97e25d22a8ecf4c89f916f42e57288c4c115db" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:6.134ex; height:2.176ex;"/></span>, where <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle t}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<mi>t</mi>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle t}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle t}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/65658b7b223af9e1acc877d848888ecdb4466560" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:0.84ex; height:2.009ex;"/></span> refers to the total.</li>
<li>Define <span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle \Delta }" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<mi mathvariant="normal">Δ<!-- Δ --></mi>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle \Delta }</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle \Delta }" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/32769037c408874e1890f77554c65f39c523ebe2" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.936ex; height:2.176ex;"/></span> as the difference between the blue and green channels of the cell and the total.
<ul><li><span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle \Delta _{b}=c_{b}-t_{b}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
<msub>
<mi mathvariant="normal">Δ<!-- Δ --></mi>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi>b</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
<mo>=</mo>
<msub>
<mi>c</mi>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi>b</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
<mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
<msub>
<mi>t</mi>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
<mi>b</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
</mstyle>
</mrow>
<annotation encoding="application/x-tex">{\displaystyle \Delta _{b}=c_{b}-t_{b}}</annotation>
</semantics>
</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle \Delta _{b}=c_{b}-t_{b}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/bf54e6d03ba0f2ad275511a978b68c42df465ca6" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:12.534ex; height:2.509ex;"/></span></li>
<li><span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle \Delta _{g}=c_{g}-t_{g}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>
<mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

</mrow>
</msub>

</math></span><img alt="{\displaystyle \Delta _{g}=c_{g}-t_{g}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline mw-invert" src="https://en.wikipedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f52f289bc46e5855102c6b6717e154824b0835f7" style="vertical-align: -1.005ex; width:12.785ex; height:2.843ex;"/></span></li></ul></li>
<li>Update the channels of the cell according to these formulas:
<ul><li><span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle c_{b}=(t_{b}+\Delta _{b}-\Delta _{g})\ \mathrm {mod} \ 4}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Single-cell_example">Single-cell example</span></h3>
<p>As an example, consider this setup:
</p>
<div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(85, 0, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">101</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">10</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
</div>
<p>The rightmost cell, <code>10</code>, calculates this:
</p>
<ul><li><span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle t_{b}=1,\ t_{g}=0,\ t_{r}=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
<semantics>

<mi>b</mi>
</mrow>
</msub>
<mo>=</mo>
<mn>1</mn>
<mo>,</mo>
<mtext> </mtext>
<msub>
<mi>t</mi>

</msub>

<mn>0</mn>

</mrow>
</msub>

</mstyle>

<li><span class="mwe-math-element"><span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;"><math alttext="{\displaystyle \Delta _{b}=1-1=0,\ \Delta _{g}=0-0=0}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">

<p>The board updates to this state:
</p>
<div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(85, 0, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">101</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(85, 0, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">101</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
</div>
<p>This is a basic example of flood-fill.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Multi-cell_example">Multi-cell example</span></h3>
<p>In this example:
</p>
<div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">112</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">112</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">01</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">112</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">01</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
</div>
<p>The middle cell adds all the cells neighboring it together, modulo 4. With the total, it computes:
</p>

<div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">112</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">112</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(255, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">203</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">112</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">01</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
</div>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="State_network">State network</span></h2>
<p>For this section, a "transformation" is one cell turning into another via interaction with a single cell, and a "combination" is one cell turning into another via interaction with two cells.
</p><p>The rules provided make it impossible for certain states to turn into any other, even when attempting to use combinations. If we create a map of these states, where nodes are connected through directed edges defined by transformations and combinations (which will be solid and dashed respectively). When doing this for every cell, it reveals that there are eight distinct clusters of states, which are mostly independent of one another.
</p>
<figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File/Frame"><a class="mw-file-description" href="/wiki/File:SmolderNetwork.png"><img class="mw-file-element" decoding="async" height="600" src="/w/images/f/f2/SmolderNetwork.png" width="556"/></a><figcaption>The network of states.</figcaption></figure>
<span>Each cluster in the network is only able to travel within itself through transformations. Combinations allow clusters to step down to the next group, however there is no way to go back. Doing this enough times (at most twice) will lead you to the bottom cluster composed of cells <div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(85, 85, 255); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">311</div>, <div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(255, 85, 255); color: #0008; border: 1px solid currentColor;">313</div>, <div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); color: #0008; border: 1px solid currentColor;">222</div>, <div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">002</div>, <div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 85); color: #0008; border: 1px solid currentColor;">133</div>, and <div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(85, 255, 85); color: #0008; border: 1px solid currentColor;">131</div>.</span>
<figure class="mw-halign-center" typeof="mw:File/Frame"><a class="mw-file-description" href="/wiki/File:SmolderSelfContainedRing.png"><img class="mw-file-element" decoding="async" height="296" src="/w/images/3/39/SmolderSelfContainedRing.png" width="600"/></a><figcaption>The self-contained cluster.</figcaption></figure>
<p>This cluster is the only one where both transformations and combinations allow traversal within it, with the downside that the group is highly symmetric.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Interactions">Interactions</span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Decay">Decay</span></h3>
<p>Certain wires when flood-filling can undergo decay, where the red channel slowly decreases.
</p>
<div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(255, 0, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">103</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">11</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">11</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">11</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">11</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
</div>
<p>In this scenario, the difference between either channel equates in a total difference of 1, leading to the red channel decreasing by one each step.
</p>
<div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(255, 0, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">103</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 85, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">012</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(85, 0, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">101</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">010</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">11</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
</div>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Oscillation">Oscillation</span></h3>
<p>Similarly, certain wires may oscillate between a set of values.
</p>
<div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">11</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">11</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">11</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 85, 85); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">11</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
</div>
<p>In this scenario, the total difference is zero, allowing the red channel to remain unaffected.
</p>
<div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 0); color: #0008; border: 1px solid currentColor;">022</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 0); color: #0008; border: 1px solid currentColor;">022</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
</div>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Logic">Logic</span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="NAND">NAND</span></h3>
<p>Where <code>X</code> and <code>Y</code> are either <code>202</code> or <code>00</code>.
</p>
<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; gap: 1em 1em;">
<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center;">
<div>Initial state</div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: #0008; border: 1px solid currentColor;">X</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">20</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: #0008; border: 1px solid currentColor;">Y</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">20</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">20</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">20</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">20</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>

<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center;">
<div>0 NAND 0</div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">00</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">00</div></div>
<div style="display: flex;"><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(170, 0, 170); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;">202</div><div style="width: 2em; height: 2em; font-size: 1.5em; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: monospace; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: #fff8; border: 1px solid currentColor;"></div></div>

<div>1 NAND 0</div>

</div>
</div>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Computational_class">Computational class</span></h2>
<p>Without infinite tiling and arbitrary modification after tiling the grid, Smolder is <a href="/wiki/Total_function" title="Total function">Total</a>, since performing any useful computation (ex: NAND gate) must irreversibly turn some of the mutable cells used in it immutable, making any kind of loop impossible.
</p><p>The computational class of unbounded Smolder with arbitrary modification after tiling the grid is unknown.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Resources">Resources</span></h2>
<ul><li><a class="external text" href="https://github.com/aadenboy/smolder" rel="nofollow">Interactive playground</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="https://aadenboy.github.io/smolder-state-tree/" rel="nofollow">State tree visualizer</a></li></ul>
